resources.string: Don\'t have an account yet? Create one!
You can scan your loyalty card now
Looks like you don\'t have Internet connection. Please check your Internet connection and retry
Looks like our server is not running. Please try again later
You don\'t have any loyalty cards yet
You don\'t have any receipts yet
Create a local copy of all the receipt scans
Shop Assist is an app that allows you to store all your loyalty cards in one place. It slims down your wallet and let\'s you do your shopping without concerns that you\'ll miss your discounts!
Shop Assist also provides you opportunity to store your receipts for later use such as return purchased items, warranty, receipt lotteries. Your receipts will never come fade!

Copyright © 2020 Shop Assist
